name: Erik Allar
tagline: Full-Stack Web Developer and Learning Enthusiast
body:
###Why you should hire me

I have a huge appetite for learning, and am a pretty sweet person in general.

Outside of coding I've been an avid bodybuilder for 4 years. I enjoy learning about life from the people I meet everday, and try to drop movie quotes into conversations as much as possible. I have a pretty sweet memory so my repotoire is always full.





###I love to create awesome things
#####Stuff I've built:

+ [Strobehub](http://strobehub.herokuapp.com/) - Full-stack open source music collaboration and creation (Javascript, Rails, PostgreSQL, Heroku, S3, Web Audio API, jQuery). [source code](https://github.com/allareri/strobehub)
+ Websiteâ€¦in a Website - Write HTML in the browser then turn the page into a website automagically (Sinatra, jQuery, HTML). [source code](https://github.com/allareri/website_in_website)
+ [Muserik](https://blooming-headland-9524.herokuapp.com/) - 'Twitter for music', my  first rails app (Rails, S3, Soundcloud API, Oauth, Javascript). [source code](https://github.com/allareri/muserik)

###I'm eager to continue learning
#####My Technical Skills and Proficiencies
+ Ruby, Rails, Sinatra
+ Heroku
+ Git
+ PostgreSQL
+ Javascript, jQuery, Backbone.js
+ HTML, CSS



#####What I want to explore next


+ Haskell - I want to learn functional programming methodologies and Haskell seems like a great place to start.
+ Node.js - Tooled around with Node for a few minutes, and it was pretty awesome. Excited to jump back in.
+ All the stuff I don't know I don't know.



###I'm an excellent creative and critical thinker
+ I was the founder an online music distribution start-up.
+ I have a degree in Finance and spent time as an Investment Advisor.
 

###I'm an awesome person to work with
Why? Because: 

+ I have strong empathy for others.
+ I'm a phenomenal leader, and not afraid to lead.
+ I'm great a teaching complex concepts to diverse groups of people.
+ I have an amazing sense of humor.
+ I always bring it.

###How I got here
+ I love to learn.
+ I love to create.
+ I love to be inspired by people.
+ I love to inspire my peers.

Simple as that.

###The Resume

#####DevBootcamp

+ 9-week programming apprenticeship program on steroids.
+ Full-Stack Web Application Development working with languages including Ruby/Rails, Javascript, PostgreSQL, HTML and CSS.
+ Lots of pair-programming and team projects.
+ Extensive use of git and Github for version control and project collaboration.

#####MusicLink LLC

+ Founder
+ Led business development efforts with companies in online media industries.
+ Drove product development on our onine distribution platform.

#####Education
+ Michigan State University 
	+ Graduated May 2010  B.A. Finance
